title: Welcome to Houston Holistic Health Clinic - An Alternative Solution to Conventional Medicine - Houston Holistic Health Clinic
description: Through holistic medicine techniques our Natural healthcare Doctor is able to determine the nutritional needs of the body to allow it to heal itself.
cleaned_text: Welcome to Houston Holistic Health Clinic Our vision is to offer people an alternative solution to conventional medicine. Many of our clients have spent years in hope for finding answers to their symptoms or illnesses. Through holistic medicine techniques our Natural healthcare Doctor is able to determine the nutritional needs of the body to allow it to heal
